title: What is the iPhone 12 Mini going to feel like? - Quora

response.answer_text: For those who seek a small flagship? The dream phone. I mean, JUST THINK ABOUT IT: The last true supercompact flagship is the XZ1 compact by Sony. Measuring 129 x 65 x 9.3 mm (5.08 x 2.56 x 0.37 in) and weighing 140 g (4.94oz) The iPhone 12 mini is not very far in size: 131.5 x 64.2 x 7.4 mm (5.18 x 2.53 x 0.29 in). And it’s lighter too: 135 g (4.76oz) Comparing the two? The 12 Mini is a bit taller, but narrower. And MUCH thinner than the XZ1 by Sony.

Very much like the original iPhone SE, which I have. Hahaha. It’s a small form factor phone, good for people who want the latest technology but really want just a tiny phone in their pockets or smaller handbags.
